title: Sunaku's Layout v6 (Engram)
notes:
Port of my Dactyl Manuform's QMK configuration [1], featuring the Engrammer layout [2] and Miryoku home row mods & layers.

[1] https://sunaku.github.io/ergohaven-remnant-keyboard.html
[2] https://sunaku.github.io/engrammer-keyboard-layout.html

Notes:
- Mouse layer is empty since ZMK doesn't yet support mouse keys.
- Separate select/extend word/line macros approximate Pascal Getreuer's work https://getreuer.info/posts/keyboards/select-word/

Changes (since v5):
- Add "Typing" layer without home row mods to avoid misfires while practicing touch-typing.
- Add layer locking shortcuts on furthest upper thumb keys + Miryoku thumb keys.  To unlock a locked layer, press the pinky shift key on the same hand as the current Miryoku thumb key, or the two furthest upper thumb keys (if unmapped).
- Update &lt key-repeat (via double-tap & hold) for Miryoku thumb keys: thanks @dankessler for this elegant solution https://discord.com/channels/877392805654306816/937645688244826154/1113260457122332672
